description: Translating Figma designs into clean and efficient HTML, ensuring the fidelity of the original design across various browsers and devices.
Building responsive and dynamic user interfaces with a focus on detail using React, ensuring optimal user experiences across various devices and screen sizes.
Implementing basic backend functionality using Node.js and Express.js to support front-end features and enhance overall application interactivity.
Exploring the integration of databases like MongoDB for data storage and retrieval in web applications. Eager to gain hands-on experience in crafting efficient solutions for web development.
Capable of independently managing and executing web development tasks. Self-driven and adept at handling various aspects of web projects from inception to completion.
Dedicated to addressing front-end and back-end development challenges, I focus on crafting innovative solutions for efficient web application development
